GSD.description:
md/raid1: stop mdx_raid1 thread when raid1 array run failed

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.337 by commit d684ceb77311410aeaf5189d321f9f564838c49a. For more details please see the references link.
